short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A free, online calculator to help with Amazon product and competitor research. Get revenue estimates for specific product niches.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Influencer Marketing Hub partnered with Helium 10 to create this amazing Amazon Sales Estimator Tool (aka Amazon Money Calculator). You can use it to find out the average number of sales that a specific Amazon product category for a specific Amazon Marketplace generates. What’s more, you can also use it to estimate sellers’ revenue potential for specific product categories. It’s a great tool for competitor research and identifying profitable product niches.
